name: Tap 3 Type
shortDescription: A cute farm-themed block-blasting puzzle game where players tap groups of matching cubes to meet level goals with limited moves.
fullDescription:
Tap 3 Type is a colorful and casual match-2 (or tap-to-blast) puzzle game set in a bright, outdoor environment, guided by an animated pig mascot. The core mechanic involves tapping clusters of two or more similarly colored cubes (featuring icons like houses, pigs, and sheep) to clear them from the board.

Each level presents a specific GOAL (e.g., clear 10 red blocks and 10 green blocks) that must be met within a limited number of MOVES.

Key Features:

  • Classic Puzzle Gameplay: Enjoy the satisfying mechanics of a block-blasting puzzle.
  • Strategic Challenge: Limited MOVES per level require careful planning to meet the GOAL.
  • Power-Ups: Utilize powerful boosters like the Cannon, Firework, and Rocket to help clear the board.
  • Performance Tracking: A star rating system tracks and rewards your level performance.
